faqs.question: What are the prerequisites for enrolling?
faqs.answer: Most of our beginner courses require no prior experience. For intermediate and advanced courses, we recommend having basic knowledge of the subject area. Each course page lists specific prerequisites.

faqs.question: How long do I have access to course materials?
faqs.answer: Once enrolled, you have lifetime access to all course materials, including future updates and additional content.

faqs.question: Do you offer job placement assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide career guidance, resume reviews, interview preparation, and connect you with our hiring partners for job opportunities.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the course within the first 30 days, we'll refund your full payment, no questions asked.

faqs.question: Are the courses self-paced or scheduled?
faqs.answer: Our courses are designed to be flexible. You can learn at your own pace, but we also have scheduled live sessions, office hours, and cohort-based learning for enhanced interaction.

faqs.question: Will I receive a certificate upon completion?
faqs.answer: Yes, you'll receive a verified certificate of completion that you can share on LinkedIn and add to your resume.
